alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 8:25PM EST until February 23 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY THAT WAS IN EFFECT THIS EVENING IS NOW CANCELLED... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM WEDNESDAY TO 4 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Wintry mix precipitation expected including snow, sleet and freezing rain. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. Highest ice accumulations are expected in elevations at or above 1500ft. * WHERE...Northern Berkshire County. * WHEN...From 4 PM Wednesday to 4 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates Wednesday evening may reach 0.5 inch to 1 inch per hour at times before transitioning to a wintry mix.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
